comments.author: KrissieKris
comments.body: yes, its “saint Stefan’s” day so pubs will be open and lots of drinking involved

comments.author: fortuneman7585
comments.body: But the Christmas market will be closed and during the day most people will be visiting their families... it will be more lively in the afternoon.

comments.author: LovelehInnit
comments.body: Stores will be closed, but most Malina supermarkets will be open - [Prevádzky - Potraviny Malina](https://www.malina.sk/).

comments.author: thegrinreaper6
comments.body: Thank you! This is good to hear!

comments.author: thegrinreaper6
comments.body: Ah! As long as everything isn't completely closed, it should be fun to visit! Thank you!
